archimate:Device.name: PAM rozcestník - virtuální instance
archimate:Device.documentation:
PAM (Pluggable Authenticaton Modules) determine how authenticaton, authorization, and password changing are handled on the system, as well as allowing configuration of additional actions to take when starting user sessiongs. Some PAM module packages provide profiles that can be used to automatically adujst the behavior of all PAM-using applicaitons on the system.
PAM profiles: - Pwquality password strength checking - Cracklib passwords strength checking - Unix authentication - Register user sessions in the systemd - Create home directory on login - Inheritable Capabilities Management
